title: man golfing: light skin tone
category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoji modifiers
description: The Man Golfing, Type-1-2 emoji is a sequence of the  Golfer,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-1-2, ? Male Sign and ? Variation Selector
apple_vendor_description: The man golfing emoji on Apple devices shows a person with a light skin tone in the midst of a powerful swing on a pristine golf course. Apple's design language imbues the scene with realistic lighting, highlighting the dynamic movement of the golf club and the concentration on the golfer's face, all rendered with soft rounded edges. This emoji is ideal for expressing a passion for sports, leisure activities, or a desire to achieve a goal.
